IN THE HIGH COURT OF KERALA AT ERNAKULAM 2021/KER/702

WEDNESDAY, THE O6TH DAY OF JANUARY 2021 / 16TH POUSHA, 1942

SR.PP.C.S.HRITHWIK
THIS CRIMINAL MISC. CASE HAVING COME UP FOR ADMISSION ON
06.01.2021, THE COURT ON THE SAME DAY PASSED THE FOLLOWING:

Crl1.MC.No.1597 OF 2020 (H) ide, 202UKERI702
ORDER

Dated this the 6th day of January 2021

The Criminal M.C.is filed challenging the further
proceedings in Crime No.115/2019 of Ernakulam
Town Police Station. Pending the Criminal M.C.,
investigation was completed and final report filed.

2. The learned Public Prosecutor submits that
the matter is now pending before the jurisdictional
court.

In such circumstances, nothing survives for
consideration in this Criminal M.C. and accordingly,
the Criminal MC.is closed, reserving the petitioners'
liberty to approach the jurisdictional court for
appropriate relief.

Sd/-
V.G.ARUN
SB/06/01/2020 JUDGE

leer
